feed.title: Combined summary - CTV Meeting #9 Reminder + Agenda (Tuesday, May 17th, 12:00 PT / 7PM UTC)

entry.title: Combined summary - CTV Meeting #9 Reminder + Agenda (Tuesday, May 17th, 12:00 PT / 7PM UTC)
entry.summary: The CTV Meeting is scheduled to take place tomorrow at 12:00 Pacific Time in ##ctv-bip-review in Libera. The meeting will be an open forum for discussion guided by the participants. Rusty's OP_TX and Adding OP_CAT / CSFS will be discussed minimally. Developers can propose meeting topics in advance through IRC to aid in allocating time for things that they would like to have discussed. This meeting provides an opportunity for developers to discuss various topics related to Bitcoin development. It is a great platform for networking and sharing ideas with other developers in the community.
